doc.after: and there is no simpler expression for this function It is therefore important not to interpret the second part of the theorem as the definition of the integral Indeed there are many functions that are integrable but lack antiderivatives that can be written as an elementary function Conversely many functions that have antiderivatives are not Riemann integrable see Volterra s function
